help.Simple: Simple will display the tables and their total number of rows.
help.List: List schema takes an argument as table name (optional).
help.Query:
Query takes an argument as string. Put your raw sql query 
 in the string to perform custom query.
help.Show:
Show method displays all the available tables in database in a tabular form.
You can pass an argument as table name to display an individual table.
help.Table:
Provide first argument as table name and display tables first 15 rows in ascending order.
Provide second argument as page number.
Provide third argument as orderBy clause e.g: columnName:asc or columnName:desc to change ordering against a column.
Provide fourth argument an integer number to display rows limit (default is 15)
